title: To modify Captain Sam's Inlet Unit M08 of the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System in Charleston County, South Carolina, and to revise the System map relating to the unit.
content: Replaces the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System map Captain Sam's Inlet Unit M08 with a map of the unit entitled John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System Captain Sam's Inlet Unit M08, increasing the size of the unit.
